title: This game is dead
body:
Carried all of my games but lose all of them why?

Toxic players
Afk
Kids who just troll

I dont see riot fixing the problem 10/10 LoL service all they want is money seen how much the champ prices on garena lol? 2x cheaper

replies.body: I've had trolls/afks in 80% of my games today. But you suck it up, realise its a weekend, and wait for the late school night ques
